___settingOrProject.description: Directly enables or disables all usage analytics for the user, or prompts the user to set the status interactively, or sets the default status for the project.

___projectSetting.description: Sets the default analytics enablement status for the project.

___help.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

description: Configures the gathering of Angular CLI usage metrics. See https://v8.angular.io/cli/usage-analytics-gathering.
